subject: Automobile Racing
Birthdays
lead_paragraph: Sam Hornish Jr. gave himself a birthday party in Victory Lane.  The icing on his cake: Hornish now leads the season points race in the Indy Racing League after his second straight victory.
snippet: Sam Hornish Jr. gave himself a birthday party in Victory Lane.  The icing on his cake: Hornish now leads the season points race in the Indy Racing League after his second straight victory.
